title: Alleged Drink Driver Happily Admits To Queensland Police | 10 News
description: You have to see it to believe it...   A 55-year-old man allegedly caught driving more than three times over the legal limit has happily admitted it to police.   Bodycam footage has been released showing the moment police intercepted the Queensland driver during roadside breath tests north of Brisbane on December 29. title: Roland Griffiths Sentenced To Life In Prison After Setting Wife On Fire In Melbourne | 10 News
description: A Melbourne father who murdered his wife by dousing her in petrol and setting her alight in front of two children, has been sentenced to life in prison.  The judge described Roland Griffiths actions as brutal and harrowing as grief-stricken family members of mother of six Kylie Sheahan comforted one another in the court. title: Angus Taylor & Andrew Hastie Fail To Resolve Liberal Leadership After Secret Meeting | 10 News
description: Aspiring Liberal Leaders, Angus Taylor and Andrew Hastie have held secret talks in an attempt to sort out who is best placed to challenge Sussan Ley.   But the timing of the meeting, just hours before the memorial of their former colleague, Dr Katie Allen, has been slammed across the political divide. title: Nipah Virus Outbreak In India Sparks International Health Alert | 10 News
description: An international health alert is underway tonight as India grapples with a virus outbreak up to 20-times more deadly than COVID.  It's called the Nipah Virus.  Countries to our north have begun airport screening but for now, Australia is planning no special action. description: Novak Djokovic insists he won't be waving the white flag, despite the enormity of facing Jannik Sinner in the semi-finals.
